_comment_casesDirectory: Path to the cases directory. Can be absolute (e.g., 'C:\data\cases' or '/absolute/path/cases') or relative to the project root (e.g., '/cases' or 'data/cases')
_comment_staffSchedulingProject: Python solver configuration. 'include' enables solver integration, 'path' is absolute path to Python project directory, 'pythonExecutable' is command to run Python (e.g., 'uv', 'python', 'python3')
